title: Strengthening Clinical Practical Skills: UXD-based Learning Experience Design (LXD) Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply UXD core principles (e.g., user-centered design, accessibility, usability) to LXD.

Learners design one prototype to improve medical/nursing learner experience (LX) in mobile environments and submit a final report reflecting ≥3 major improvements based on peer reviews and instructor feedback.
Learners can develop personalized learning experiences tailored to real corporate training scenarios through the LXD process.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
